DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this research study is to show that features derived from data gathered using SHIMMER wearable sensor platform can capture adherence and proficiency in the performance of exercises that are part of Tai Chi interventions.
DOC.brief_title: A Wearable System to Monitor Tai Chi Practice
DOC.criteria: Young style Tai Chi practitioners Any movement impairment that will impede Tai Chi movements performance
